mapper.sql: select m.team_idx as team_idx , d1.team_nm as team_nm , m.member_idx as member_idx , d2.member_id as member_id , d2.member_name as member_name , m.member_type as member_type , date_format(m.reg_dtm, '%Y-%m-%d') as reg_date from team_member m left join team d1 on m.team_idx = d1.team_idx left join member_info d2 on m.member_idx = d2.member_idx
